<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Onyx Panther](/Equipment.aspx?ID=229)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 569 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use a Sneak action

**Requirement** You are trained in Stealth
</row>

</column>

---

This small stone is a stylized panther shape. When you activate it, you can move your full Speed (instead of half) during the triggering Sneak and any other time you Sneak this turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
